parameters: Where have you been? Your shift started 30 minutes ago.
Everyone else is already working. Get to helping them
or you won't get your pay this month.
Oh and watch for cracks on the walls and floor, there
are some places ready to collapse. Wouldn't want to
get crushed! Now off with you!

Hiring kids is not ideal as this is dangerous work, but

Losing a life is terrible, but to lose a child is even
